mapper.insert: insert into question(quest_no, quest_content, food_sell_no, quest_postdate, mem_id) values(question_seq.nextval, #{questContent}, #{foodSellNo}, sysdate, #{memId})
mapper.select: select quest_no, quest_content, food_sell_no, to_char(to_date(quest_postdate), 'yyyy-mm-dd')as quest_postdate, mem_id FROM question WHERE mem_id=#{value} ORDER BY quest_postdate ASC
select count(*) from review r, food f where f.food_no=#{value} and r.food_no=f.food_no
mapper.update: update food set food_score= (select round(sum(score)/count(*),1) from review r,food f where f.food_no=#{value} and r.food_no=f.food_no ) where food_no=#{value}
mapper.select: select count(*) from review r, food_sell fs where fs.food_sell_no=#{value} and r.food_no=fs.food_no
